summary: My take on Elemental Spells using the Vanilla spells in Skyrim. One nights work. Hope yall enjoy it!!!
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my 3rd Skyrim Mod.

I wanted to combine the vanilla rune spells and see what that would do for my sneaky mage characters trap setting. From that premise I combined all 24 vanilla destruction spells into 8 very powerful but balanced Elemental spells.

Each spell type does Fire, Frost, and Shock dmg with the additional Stamina, Magicka, and \'target on fire\' dmg associated with vanilla Destruction spells.


The spells can be obtained at any forge under \"Misc\" catagory. Each recipe will only show up once you\'ve learned the three vanilla spells 1st.

Example: 

Elemental Rune Recipe = (Must know Fire Rune, Frost Rune, and Shock Rune) 1 Ruined book, 1 Black Soul Gem(filled with Grand Soul)



This mod sould install real easily with NMM.

Endorse is you like my work.






PS. For those of you who don\'t know, I love to CHEAT!.
I included an optional bat file for all the ingredients you\'ll need to create the tomes. Enjoy!:D
author: Mordrid Cowl
